failure.message: Severity: 1 - Line: 3 - Error: Scenario steps out of Given/When/Then order.
Severity: 1 - Line: 1 - Error: Lazy Debugging through puts, p, or print
Severity: 1 - Line: 1 - Error: Nested step call.
Severity: 1 - Line: 1 - Error: Hook with no content.
Severity: 1 - Line: 1 - Error: Hook is only comments.
Severity: 1 - Line: 1 - Error: Hook found outside of the designated hooks file
Severity: 1 - Line: 1 - Error: Hook without a begin/rescue. Reduced visibility when debugging.
